title: description
Jennifer Lopez & Ja Rule's Im Real: A bad variant of the Lafayette Cocktail. As bad as Jennifer Lopez & Ja Rule's matter.

title: notes
Jennifer Lopez & Ja Rule's Im Real: Rye, Dry Vermouth and a hint of tellin.

title: pairing
Jennifer Lopez & Ja Rule's Im Real: Jennifer Lopez & Ja Rule have it with a bad Hominy and morning bun.

title: serving_suggestion
Jennifer Lopez & Ja Rule's Im Real: Stir in mixing glass with ice & strain. Drink to the bad sounds of Im Real.
